header.h1: K-12 Online Public School in Massachusetts!

div.p: TEC Connections Academy Commonwealth Virtual School (TECCA) is more than a fully accredited online school. It's a tight-knit school community offering all the services and resources needed to create a well-rounded student experience.

Ready to go? Start your online
registration now!

h3.a: Important information about COVID-19 for enrolled families

br.p: Students throughout Massachusetts are thriving at TEC Connections Academy Commonwealth Virtual School, a tuition-free online public school. TECCA gives students the flexibility to learn at home with a curriculum that meets rigorous state education standards.

tr.td: Traditional Standard Pathway: Students take a full course load in the fall and spring sessions. This option is available to students at all grade levels.

Year-Round Extended Pathway: Students take fewer courses than a typical course load in the fall and spring sessions, but they must also attend the summer session. This track provides students with more time for other activities throughout the traditional school year while still allowing them to complete a full workload over the course of the year. This option will be available beginning September 2018, as part of the 2018–2019 school year. It is available to students entering grades 9–12.

Accelerated Pathway: Students attend fall, spring, and summer sessions full time, enabling them to graduate early or make up lost credits. This option will be available in September 2018, as part of the 2018–2019 school year. This option is available to students entering grades 9–12.
